HBSA3.SA.summary: Hidrovias do Brasil S.A. provides integrated logistics solutions in Latin America. The company also offers cargo storage and lifting, intermediation and agency, long-distance sea transport, warehousing, specialized cargo terminal, fluvial transportation, and navigation assets leasing services. It also operates as a financial operations agency. The company operates its services on the various corridors, including ParanÃ¡-Paraguay waterway, the Uruguay river, and the Montevideo terminal; TapajÃ³s and Amazonas rivers; and Trombetas and Amazonas rivers. Hidrovias do Brasil S.A. was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil.

RLOG3.SA.summary: Cosan LogÃ­stica S.A., through its subsidiaries, provides transport and elevation logistics services for the export of commodities in Brazil. It operates through three segments: North Operations, South Operations, and Container Operations. The company's activities include integrated transport, handling, storage, and shipment from the production centers to the southern and southeast ports. It also engages in the container logistics and other container operations, as well as cargo transportation, and port operation of distribution terminals and other related activities. In addition, the company is involved in the operation of terminals for transshipment and export of sugar and grains in the Port of Santos. Further, it operates in railway and road transportation business. The company was formerly known as Cosan Infraestrutura S.A. and changed its name to Cosan LogÃ­stica S.A. in July 2014. The company was incorporated in 2014 and is based in SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil. Cosan LogÃ­stica S.A. is a subsidiary of Cosan Ltd.

SEQL3.SA.summary: Sequoia LogÃ­stica e Transportes S.A. provides logistics and transportation services. The company's services include storage, handling, picking, packing, shipping, door-to-door, courier, squeegee, and stocking. Its services cover e-commerce, education, and fashion and retail markets. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Embu das Artes, Brazil.
